definition: abbr. for Shijing 詩經|诗经[Shi1 jing1], the Book of Songs
"speech" or "words" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 149)/see also 言字旁[yan2 zi4 pang2]
a poem/a composition in verse/fig. epic (compared with historical epic)/the biblical Book of Psalms
Shijing, the Book of Songs, early collection of Chinese poems and one of the Five Classics of Confucianism 五經|五经[Wu3 jing1]
the Book of Songs 詩經|诗经[Shi1 jing1] and the Book of History 書經|书经[Shu1 jing1]

sentences.english: Poetry prophecy is an exotic flower in remote mountains which is in full bloom in our Chinese classics hundred-flower garden.
sentences.chinese: 诗谶是盛开在中国古典文学百花园里的一株深山奇葩。

sentences.english: Most of the scenes are written in verse, but some are in prose.
sentences.chinese: 她所写的诗大部分都是无韵诗。

sentences.english: The poem was all the rage then.
sentences.chinese: 这首诗在当时十分流行。

sentences.english: The so - called poet ground out some verses.
sentences.chinese: 这个所谓的诗人搜索枯肠做成几句诗。

sentences.english: She can recite the long poem from the beginning to the end.
sentences.chinese: 她能把那首长诗从头到尾地背下来。

sentences.english: To my amazement, he was able to recite the poem from memory.
sentences.chinese: 令我大为惊奇的是，他把这首诗从头到尾背了出来。

sentences.english: Or it was just poetic bullshit?
sentences.chinese: 还是说，这只是一句听上去像诗的屁话？

sentences.english: He opened the inkstand to write a poem.
sentences.chinese: 他打开墨水瓶去写一首诗。

sentences.english: Visual beauty of poetry is very important in modern poetry.
sentences.chinese: 诗的视觉美在现代诗歌中十分重要。

sentences.english: Illustrated poetry is the artistic integration of Chinese poetry and painting .
sentences.chinese: 题画诗，是中国诗歌与中国绘画相互融合的艺术结晶。

sentences.english: Martin recollected his blank-verse tragedy, and sent it instead.
sentences.chinese: 马丁想起了他的素体诗悲剧，便把它寄去充数。

sentences.english: Lu You was a famous patriotic poet in the Southern Song Dyansty .
sentences.chinese: 陆游诗南宋著名的爱国诗人。

sentences.english: It's a poem deeply invested, in fact, in the entire Western tradition of poetry in general.
sentences.chinese: 实际上，这是一首植根于，西方诗歌传统的诗。

sentences.english: Judges 5 is also another ancient song fragment in verses four to five.
sentences.chinese: 士师记》5中也有古老歌谣的片段，诗4和。

sentences.english: Nature composes some of her loveliest poems for the microscope and telescope.
sentences.chinese: 自然为显微镜和望远镜创作了一些她最优美的诗。
这首诗活络了他的想像力。

definition: a poem/a composition in verse/fig. epic (compared with historical epic)/the biblical Book of Psalms
regular verse/strict poetic form with eight lines of 5, 6 or 7 syllables and even lines rhyming
a pre-Tang Dynasty genre of poetry, relatively free in form, usually having four, five, six or seven characters per line
poetic form consisting of four lines of five syllables, with rhymes on first, second and fourth line
